original_text: Those people died before they should have done. A great flood of water took them away. They had no safe place to stand. 22: Long ago, a flood of water destroyed people who had turned against God. See Genesis 6:5-22. Those people died before they should have done. A great flood of water took them away. They had no safe place to stand. 22: Long ago, a flood of water destroyed people who had turned against God. See Genesis 6:5-22. Those people died before they should have done. A great flood of water took them away. They had no safe place to stand. 22: Long ago, a flood of water destroyed people who had turned against God. See Genesis 6:5-22. Those people died before they should have done.
korean_text: 그들은 때가 이르기 전에 끊겨 버렸고 그들의 터는 강물로 말미암아 함몰되었느니라

sentences.original_text: Those people died before they should have done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 제때 죽지 못하고 일찍 죽었다.

sentences.original_text: A great flood of water took them away.
They had no safe place to stand.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게는 서 있을 안전한 곳이 없었다.

sentences.original_text: Long ago, a flood of water destroyed people
